column6: Victor Creed has slowly changed over the course of the past few months...from his shift in AXIS to joining the team of WOLVERINES, he's actually GROWN as an individual. So how does he use his new outlook on life to steal a pirate ship?! Sharp and Ogun now battle it out for complete domination of body and soul...while Fantomelle and Culpepper's mission takes them even deeper into a mission they hadn't planned for.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | writer:Ray Fawkes | writer:Charles Soule | artist:Jonathan Marks
